transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji aa rahi hai sir, bataiye.
Customer: Main idhar ye Shree Naukar Sadi se baat kar raha tha Nayan bhai.
Executive: Haan ji Nayan bhai bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan haan. Main actually mera concern ye hai ki mere ko field executive chahiye. Mera ye jo office hai na sales office apna ye Surat Millennium market mein hi hai aur usme jo GST mention hai na wo manufacturing industry ka waha pe hai. Aur apne jo main sales office hai wo Surat Surat mein hi hai. To kya ki mera koi field field manager jo rehta hai physical visit koi nahi ho pa rahi hai. Mere ko actually idea bhi nahi aa raha kaise kya kaam karna hai isliye maine call kiya aapko.
Executive: Actually sir abhi aapka jo account hai bataiye. Main aapko bata raha hu sir Nayan sir ki abhi jo aapka account hamare paas handle ho raha hai na sir wo Noida head office se ho raha hai, theek hai sir. Aur hamare taraf se hum aapko ek account manager provide.
Executive: Kuch bol rahe the sir.
Executive: Hamari taraf se hum aapko ek account manager provide karte hai sir. Jo over the video meeting aapko connect karte hai sir aur sari cheeze aapko proper tarike se guide karta hai ki sir services wagera kaise sir aapko use karna hai.
Customer: Nahi aap aap samajh nahi rahe hain ki jo mera sales office hai na mera pura region jahan se main pura sales sambhalta hu. Mera ye Surat mein hi hai. Surat se chahiye na mere ko local banda chahiye aisa keh raha hu. Mere ko Delhi wala nahi chahiye. Mere ko local chahiye.
Executive: Wo to sir possible nahi hoga sir local ka sir. Kyun sir? Kyunki abhi kya ho raha hai na ki sir hamare sir hamara koi bhi account onboard hota hai na to hamare Noida head office aata hai, theek hai. Aur yahi se hum aapko ek account manager sir provide karte hai sir jo aapko service mein sara ka sara aapko guide bhi karte hai aur help bhi karte hai sir.
Customer: Mere ko koi mail wel karna padega kya jo local se main banda mil jaye.
Executive: Sir mail ka baat nahi hai sir agar hamara feasible rehta hai na waha pe local to definitely aapko local hi person hum provide karte hai sir. But abhi hamare taraf se koi kya hota hai na jaise aapka account boliye.
Customer: Physical milta hai na bhai ji mere friend circle mein bahut kar rahe hain sabko milta hai.
Executive: Sir jo location agar feasible hota hai sir to waha ke according agar possible hota hai to hum waha pe provide karte hai nahi to hamara sir ha location location bataya na mera Surat location hi hai. Surat location.
Executive: But aapka account sir hamare head office aaya hua hai na sir yaha se to hum sir location matlab local person to sir hum provide nahi karte hai sir. Matlab hum aapko ek account manager karenge waha pe kya dikkat aa rahi hai agar hum over the video meeting agar hum sari cheeze Nayan ji aapko guide karenge ek baar mein aapko nahi samajh mein aa raha hai sir main aapko dobara matlab aap hame batao uske according hum meeting hamesha kar liya karenge ek weekly aap se feedback bhi le liya karenge sir aap se.
Customer: Local bande hi.
Executive: Boliye sir.
Customer: Mere ko local bande hi chahiye aisa baat karke liya tha maine. Ab usme dikha bhi tha jab main PPT dekhi thi.
Executive: To aapne jinse baat kiya tha sir unko aapne call nahi kiya? Ki aapne mujhe kyun bataya tha ki main aapko local banda provide karunga. Unko aapne phone nahi kiya tha?
Customer: Baat wohi tha actually. Baat kya bola unhone? Unhone kya bola aapko? Unhone bola sales office sales office apna Surat mein hi hai Millennium mein aur walking distance pe hi hai office IndiaMART ka. Hmm hmm. Theek hai. Samjhe to ye to main cheez kya hai ki sales office mera yahi hai pura main yahi se dekhta hu sales to service manager bhi mere ko. Nahi main wo nahi keh raha hu sir abhi aapne mujhe bataya na ye cheez ki aapne jab service liya tha to aapko bataya gaya tha ki aapka local se hi operate hoga hai na sir. Ye cheez aap keh rahe ho hai na sir.
Customer: PPT mein padha tha. Nahi bataya nahi PPT maine puri check ki thi. PPT jo dikhai jati hai na shuru mein kaam yahi banta wali. Haan haan. Kaun sa PPT sir? Mere laptop mein khuli thi. Aapne kabhi jo service manager hai jo account onboard karane aate hai new account wale. Haan haan. Haan to main wohi puch raha hu ki kaun sa PPT aapko dikhaya tha unhone? To jo present jo presentation diya jata hai usme padha tha maine.
Executive: Sir uska koi ye hai aapke paas photo wagera hum bhi ek baar check kare kya presentation tha sir. Hamare paas se TrustSeal service ka hota hai sir TrustSeal service mein jo cheez hum aapko provide karenge wo service ka aapko benefit bataya gaya hoga sir. Saath hi saath uska kya price hai sir. Mere ko ye bataiye customer care ko mail karna padega kya local manager ke liye. Sir mail karne ka aapne call kiya sir hamare customer care pe number pe aap mail karoge sir tab bhi main hi aapko connect karunga sir hai na sir. Agar fir bhi sir local account manager ka agar possible hota na to definitely main aapko karwa deta sir. Abhi jaise agar humne aapko account manager aap.
Executive: Boliye sir boliye. Samjhe na ki ye mera local mein hi hai sales office aur Surat mein hi pura team baithti hai. To mere ko local se assign kariye na banda.
Executive: Sir local ka to aisa hota nahi hai sir, theek hai but main ek kaam karta hu aaj mere manager to leave pe hai main ek baar kal discuss kar leta hu sir. Theek hai fir agar possible hoga to main ek baar aapko baat bhi karwa dunga unse direct theek hai. Lekin karwane ka main aapko commit nahi karunga sir wo cheez. Priority basis mein main ye nahi keh raha hu ki main aapko commit karunga ki main aapka karwa hi dunga sir. Agar possible hoga sir agar aisa kuch then definitely hum aage request dalenge sir. Agar ho jata hai then definitely hum provide kar nahi to sir hamara jo account aapka handle hoga sir wo hamare head office se hi hoga sir.
Customer: Theek hai mere ko mail karna padega kya? Main mail kiye deta hu. Nahi mail karne ki jarurat already aapka concern open ho gaya aap hamare customer care pe bhi call karte ho na to ek concern hamare paas open hota hai. Already aapne mujhe bata diya. Theek hai aur hamara jo discussion hota hai sir wo recorded line pe hi hota hai. Theek hai to uske liye aap nishchit rahiye aaj mere manager available nahi hai jaise hi aati hai kal to shayad I hope join kare main aapko baat bhi karwa dunga uske regarding theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs a local field executive.

- Physical visits are not happening.



Resolution:

- Explained account is handled by Noida head office.

- Offered an account manager for video meetings.

- Will discuss possibility of local executive with manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss with manager and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- local executive, account manager, surat, ppt
